projects.title: Cloud Native Web Application
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a RESTful CRUD customer management web application on **Google Cloud Platform** using **Node.js** and **MySQL**.
- Designed a **Terraform** template for various IaaS services including VPC, Subnets, Compute Engine, Cloud SQL, Cloud Storage, Load Balancing, Cloud DNS, Cloud Logging, IAM Roles, Cloud Functions, Pub/Sub, and Firewall Rules.
- Created a **CI/CD pipeline** with **GitHub Actions** to trigger Packer image builds and Cloud Deploy actions.

projects.title: TRENDR - News Summarization Application
projects.bodyText:
- Led the software development lifecycle for a news summary app using **Next.js**, **React**, **Redux**, and **Node.js**.
- Integrated external APIs for news fetching, **GPT-4 APIs** for article summarization, and **Twitter APIs** for related tweet display.
- Utilized **MongoDB** and **Mongoose** to create a full-stack application.

projects.title: World Energy - Web Scrapping
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a comprehensive **database** project using **Python** and **MySQL**.
- Performed **Twitter scraping** for data gathering, munging, cleaning, and normalization using Python scripts.
- Created domain-related tables and visualized data using **ER Diagrams** and **SQL Queries**.
- Analyzed energy consumption data by country and geographical groupings, focusing on CO2 emissions and renewable energy sources.
- Tools used: **Python**, **MySQL**, **Twitter API**, **Data Visualization**.
